name: pritham-dsa-search-engine
description: Personal search engine for my DSA problem collection - built during interview prep

scripts.build: echo 'Compiling C++ search engine...' && g++ -o search_engine Mini_Search_Engine_CLI.cpp -std=c++11
scripts.start: npm run build && cd web-interface && npm install && node server.js

author: Pritham Nandavaram
